attributes.action: put before parliament that an elected government must serve its five term unless it loses a vote of confidence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Governments are elected for a five year term .. it should not be such that a prime minister can 'go to the country' to secure an extras term when he/she sees the party riding high in the opinion polls.

The only reason that a term should finish early is in the event of a lost vote of confidence
